paragraphs: I heard some interesting news recently, from a contact in Sentinel. I'd like to discuss it with you.

I think it better if we meet outside of the guild's safehouse for now, as I don't want people speculating on rumors. Besides, I felt like having a relaxing drink in the tavern would be good. Walks keeps telling me I need to learn to relax.
Come and have a drink with me and we can talk.
